text:
Hi All, I am HubSpot Administrator and Developer with a
strong focus on process improvement, database
management, strategic planning, reporting, and driving
measurable growth. Experienced in designing and
implementing customized CRM environments,
streamlining operations through automation, delivering
actionable insights via advanced reporting, and
fostering team adoption through training and
enablement. Dedicated to achieving strategic
objectives and fostering measurable success through
collaborative efforts.
Proven expertise in HubSpot custom API integrations to
seamlessly connect platforms, saving valuable time forthe sales team.

My Achievement on HubSpot INBOUND 2023 event:
<https://www.linkedin.com/posts/prasad-nandamuri-821a41b8_inbound23-HubSpotinbound23-milestoneachievement-activity-7106313218628755456-1QjH/?utm_source=share&utm_medium=member_desktop|https://www.linkedin.com/posts/prasad-nandamuri-821a41b8_inbound23-HubSpotinbound23-milestoneachievement-activity-7106313218628755456-1QjH/?utm_source=share&utm_medium=member_desktop>

I am open to work with freelance and part time opportunities

Hey HubSpot Community! Blue Frog here—an Elite HubSpot Partner—and we’re excited to announce we’ve just expanded our capabilities through a recent acquisition. With this growth, we’re looking to add a *Sales Engineer* to our team. If you’re passionate about bridging tech solutions and HubSpot strategy—or know someone who is—check out the role and apply here: <https://www.bluefrogdm.com/careers/sales-engineer>
Feel free to spread the word and reach out with any questions. Thank you, and we can’t wait to keep growing alongside this community!
